name: Chang Guo
story: Zixin grew up in a small village in China. His parents were farmers and he learned to tend the land from a young age. However, he also had a strong desire to help others and saw the army as an opportunity to do so. After joining, he trained as a Combat Life Saver and has since deployed on numerous missions, saving countless lives with his medical skills. He remains single, dedicating himself fully to his role in the army.
